name: Youtube − Dark Gray 2012
description: Do you hate staring into a light bulb? So do I...
additional_info: [2012-01-12] Ok, so I decided to redo this style completely from scratch since Youtube’s layout has changed a lot since my last update. It still isn’t as complete as it used to be at some point (for example I didn’t go through the effort to recreate the icons, but most of the original icons now use alpha transparency anyway, so it’s not as much of an issue), but it’s still a lot better than using the old one.

discussions.name: It breaks "Youtube Enhancer" button functionality and background
thumbs up/down and Reply icon glitch
